name: Bulk Naturals Wholesale - Safflower Oil (High Oleic & Linoleic)
description: Bulk Naturals Wholesale offers cold-pressed Safflower Oil in two varieties: High-Oleic (10.2g monounsaturated fat per serving) and High-Linoleic (72.31% linoleic acid, 16% oleic acid). Natural source of essential fatty acids for barrier repair, moisturizing, and carrier oil applications. Cold-pressed processing preserves fatty acid integrity.

products: Safflower Oil - High-Linoleic (72.31% linoleic acid, 16% oleic acid)
products.notes: Two varieties provide formulation flexibility: High-Oleic for penetration enhancement, High-Linoleic for essential fatty acid content. Cold-pressed ensures quality and preserves beneficial compounds. Glass packaging options prevent oxidation. Natural source of barrier repair lipids.

notes: Two varieties for different formulation needs: High-Oleic (monounsaturated-rich, oxidatively stable) and High-Linoleic (essential omega-6 fatty acid source). Cold-pressed processing preserves fatty acid integrity. Natural source of barrier repair lipids. Suitable as carrier oil or fatty acid source in formulations.

Natural oils supplier specializing in bulk wholesale. Offers two cold-pressed safflower oil varieties for different formulation needs: High-Oleic (penetration enhancer focus) and High-Linoleic (essential fatty acid focus with 72.31% linoleic acid). Natural source of fatty acids for barrier repair and moisturizing. Ideal carrier oil for lipid-rich formulations requiring natural, plant-based fatty acid sources.
